participant_1.background: i'm a recording engineer and own my own studio. my ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. whats up i am a 46 year old single dad 46 a kids. i live in california but the recording artist market was dead last year. i prefer being inside.

participant_2.background: i enjoy going to the park. my favorite movie is friday. i'm a doctor. my daughter is a child prodigy. i'm now looking for a new job.

content.text: After Coming From Reality, did you wanna continue making albums?
I'm leading with it, to put the audience at their ease.
